meanings.sent1: He reinjured his ankle while playing soccer.
meanings.sent2: She was careful not to reinjure her wrist during the game.
meanings.sent3: After he reinjured his knee, he decided to take a break from sports.
meanings.sent4: The old wound seemed to taunt him, daring him to reinjure it.
meanings.sent5: The risk of reinjury made him hesitant to resume his training.

meanings.definition: Suffer a new injury after a previous one
meanings.sent1: The athlete reinjured his shoulder during practice.
meanings.sent2: She was unlucky to reinjure her back so soon after the first injury.
meanings.sent3: His tendency to reinjure himself became a running joke among his friends.
meanings.sent4: The fragile bone seemed to invite reinjury with every misstep.
meanings.sent5: The fear of reinjury haunted her every time she stepped onto the field.
